metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14631 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: moodle before versions 3.5.2, 3.4.5, 3.3.8 is vulnerable to a boost theme -blog search GET parameter insufficiently filtered. The breadcrumbnavigation provided by Boost theme when displaying search results of a blogwere insufficiently filtered, which could result in reflected XSS if a userfollowed a malicious link containing JavaScript in the search parameter.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
